mapper.insert: insert into review values (#{review_num}, #{review_id}, #{review_item_id}, #{review_score}, #{review_subject}, #{review_content}, #{review_text}, sysdate,#{review_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where review_item_id = #{ITEM_ID}
select count(*) from review where review_id = #{member_id}
select * from review where review_image is not null and review_item_id = #{ITEM_ID} order by review_reg_date desc
select b.* from (select * from orderinfo where order_member_id = #{member_id} order by order_time asc) b where to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY. MM. DD. HH24:MI') < order_time
